content: S-BS (S) Screwdriver bit sets Standard-performance set of screwdriver bits for soft joint applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Bits and sockets- - ### FEATURES:Features Simple and robust design – manufactured from high-strength steel Convenient storage case helps prevent bits getting lost Perfect-fit geometry for greater driving grip, precision-machined to help reduce stripping and wobbling Applications ¼ hexagon connection end for use with all common bit holders (DIN ISO 1173-D 6.3) Covers all basic screw fastening tasks – recommended for soft-joint applications, e.g. in wood For driving screws in a variety of materials Torx®, Phillips®, square, hexagon and Pozi® versions available ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 1 in Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2039189 - Insert bit pocket pack - Package Size 1 pc - 2039201 - Professional bit kit - Package Size 1 pc
